reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress well-made and comfortable, with a perfect fit and length. They appreciate its style, with one customer noting the sequins give just enough shimmer, and another mentioning it's perfect for a black tie event. The dress receives positive feedback for its size, color, and sturdiness, with customers loving how it moves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this dress, design, color and all.
items.body: Perfect dress for my daughters wedding. Everyone loves it. I fell in love with the color and perfect size too. Very comfy love the style and sheerness. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely evening dress
items.body: Absolutely beautiful. I am 5”2’ and the fit and length was perfect Read more
items.author: Francine Cutright

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: Love it. Size was true to my height. No need to fix the hems. Comfortable and perfect for the occasion Read more
items.author: awilda cintron

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit great but odd length
items.body: Pretty dress. I felt comfortable in it. Loved how it moved & flowed. It came with a lightweight sheer shawl. I'd consider it more semi formal though because of the teacup length. On me, I did not like the length & the reason for the 4 stars is that the inner layer is about a foot shorter than the outer sheer layer. It just looked odd. I ended up going with a different dress for the event I went to but I would've worn this one if the skirt layers had been the same length. Its a shame because I really did love the fit. It was true to size. I ordered a large. I'm about 185 pounds, 5'5, 38C. Read more
items.author: Snowybaby590

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for the ball
items.body: I bought this for a last minute invite to the Marine Corp Ball's 250th anniversary. This was a formal event and I didn't want to spend a ton of money, but this was perfect! I am 5'8", 160 lbs with an athletic build and it fit perfectly in a large. The zipper catches a bit where the bottom of the dress attaches to the top portion but nothing to worry about. Lots of compliments and we looked terrific! Read more
items.author: Pat L

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No tamaño correcto
items.body: Me pusieron que la devolución era hasta el 1/31 y cerraron la devolución el vestidor me quedó grande Read more
items.author: Tere riera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and pretty
items.body: Great mother of the bride dress. Very comfortable and the wrap was perfect for pictures and easily folded up when the party got started. Read more
items.author: Marianne

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Dress is beautiful but not for women under 5ft 3in. Also, watch the colors you order, not true to the photo. Read more
items.author: Joe Baumann

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B-lavender, B-grape, Burgundy, B-black, B-blush, B-darkgreen, Grey Blue, Peacock Green, Black, Champagne, B-burgundy, B-navy, Darkgreen, Light Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
